main: ^It is a lenten festival held annually on Holy Week on the island of Marinduque, Philippines. This is a week-long celebration participated in by male penitents in costumes who parade around town.

c-0: ^This is a week-long celebration participated in by male penitents in costumes who parade around town. The "Moriones" are men and women in costumes and masks called Morion masks replicating the biblical Imperial Roman soldiers within the story of the Passion of the Christ.
